results.task_name: Create a project from natural language
results.prompt_sent: Create a new project called "Mobile App Redesign". Set its status to active and add a description: "Complete redesign of the mobile application with new UX patterns." Also add the tags: mobile, redesign, ux.

arguments.name: Mobile App Redesign
arguments.description: Complete redesign of the mobile application with new UX patterns.

results.task_name: Create a workunit with full details
results.prompt_sent: I need to track some work on fixing our login page. Create a workunit named "Fix Login Page Bug" in project b618ecf1f90c4b168dc9e7421d1044b9. The problem is that users can't log in when they have special characters in their password. We'll know it's done when all character types are supported and there are regression tests. Make it high priority.

arguments.name: Fix Login Page Bug
arguments.problem_statement: Users cannot log in when they have special characters in their password
arguments.success_criteria: All character types (letters, numbers, symbols) are supported and regression tests pass

results.task_name: Add three tasks to a workunit
results.prompt_sent:
Add these three tasks to workunit 8c46482a60b34d08bd01328d424c306b:
1. "Reproduce the bug locally" - high priority
2. "Identify root cause" - high priority  
3. "Write fix and add regression tests" - normal priority

All should start as todo.

arguments.title: Write fix and add regression tests

results.prompt_sent: Mark task 25c31e0fb6c3490c85aa2265d7028e51 as currently in progress.
Find the workunit called "Fix Login Page Bug" and get its full details including all tasks.

Save a context note on workunit 8c46482a60b34d08bd01328d424c306b recording this decision: we chose to fix the password validation on the backend rather than the frontend, because it's more secure. This is a high-importance architectural decision.

arguments.title: Password Validation Fix Approach
arguments.content: Chose to fix password validation on the backend rather than the frontend for better security.

results.prompt_sent: Create a new product asset called "Workunit Mobile SDK" in draft status. It's a software product currently in the development lifecycle stage. Add a description: "iOS and Android SDK for integrating Workunit into mobile applications."

arguments.name: Workunit Mobile SDK
arguments.description: iOS and Android SDK for integrating Workunit into mobile applications.

results.prompt_sent: Show me the details of project b618ecf1f90c4b168dc9e7421d1044b9, including how many workunits and assets it has.
Update workunit 8c46482a60b34d08bd01328d424c306b: change its priority to urgent, and set its tags to: bug, authentication, critical.

Mark workunit 8c46482a60b34d08bd01328d424c306b as completed. Add completion notes explaining that the password validation was moved to the backend, all special characters now work, and 12 regression tests were added.
details: 'completion_notes' should be present but is missing/empty

paths: completion_notes:Password validation moved to backend, special characters now work, 12 regression tests added.
